font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 顺从的：ready or disposed to comply: submissive
【例】a corrupt腐败的 regime政权 aided by a compliant television station
【近】amenable, conformable, docile温顺的，驯服的, submissive, tractable易驾驭的；易处理的
【反】balky, contumacious, disobedient, incompliant, insubordinate, intractable, noncompliant, obstreperous, rebel, rebellious, recalcitrant, refractory, unamenable, ungovernable, unruly, willful, wayward 顽固，难驾驭的
【记】 源自comply
